articles.title: Why is India reaching out to Latin America?
articles.description: Over the last few years, India’s outreach to Latin America has increased. External affairs minister S. Jaishankar, who has visited Brazil, Argentina and Paraguay, is to visit Guyana and Colombia later this month. Mint explains India’s interest in Latin America

articles.title: FIFA men's world rankings: The USMNT overtake Germany, rise to 13th; Argentina go top with France second
articles.description: France go second while Belgium remain in fourth
articles.content: After an exciting World Cup in November when Argentina were crowned champions of, the newest FIFA men's national team rankings have dropped. While Argentina taking the top spot from Brazil, who fell to third, was expected along with France coming in ... [3871 chars]

articles.title: How a wind-up convinced Maradona he could win World Cup on his own
articles.description: Late Argentina great’s personal trainer recounts in this book extract a visit he made to the player’s room before Mexico 86
articles.content: Diego Maradona arrived in Mexico like a well-tuned violin. He had managed to stabilise his weight at 76kg long before the World Cup. His physical condition was optimal from the feet to the neck, and little by little he managed to acclimatise to the A... [7240 chars]

articles.title: World Cup winner Argentina moves atop men’s FIFA rankings; Canada climbs to No. 47
articles.description: The Canadian men’s soccer team climbed six spots in the rankings, boosted by CONCACAF Nations League wins over Curacao and Honduras
articles.content:
Argentina players celebrate with their families and World Cup trophies after a friendly against Panama, in Buenos Aires, Argentina, on March 23.AGUSTIN MARCARIAN

articles.title: World Cup winner Argentina moves atop FIFA rankings while Canada climbs to No. 47
articles.description: ZURICH — World Cup winner Argentina topped the latest FIFA rankings for the first time in six years while the Canadian men, boosted by CONCACAF Nations League wins over Curaçao and Honduras, climbed six places to No. 47.
articles.content:
